title: [Large-scale] Shadow Curriculum Design and Application in Medical Education: Mobile Microlearning-Based Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Education Experience or Relevant Professional Background
context.additional_context: Informal learning support program for working professionals, offering strategies to enhance academic achievement outside formal educational courses

learning_goals: Develop a shadow curriculum module by applying the ADDIE model-based instructional design process
Plan and produce 10-minute microlearning content in a mobile environment
Learners can analyze formative assessment data to propose curriculum improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
